channel.title: Building A Strong Team
channel.description:
[center][b] Hello[/b], I'm going to give a basic overview, I'll be keeping details minimal here. I'm looking for dedicated, trustworthy, and respectful people who're interested and seeking to grow with a long-term Developement Team & Orginization. Serious canidiate only please. If you're interested or have questions PM me, with the position you're interested in, or with your questions + your skype name.
[img]http://i63.tinypic.com/2ut1bo0.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Available Positions:[/u][/b]
- GFX Artist - Java Programmer - Web Developer - Coordinator
[u][b]GFX Artist Requirements:[/b][/u]
- You must provide, or either create something upon request to represent your skill level - Your work must be clean, and professional looking - Some images I need may have deadlines, they [u]will[/u] be reasonable but you must be able to provide images upon deadlines
[u][b]Java Programmer Requirements:[/b][/u]
- You must have a decent amount of knowledge in Java - You must be trustworthy - You must provide past projects, & Java experience (proof) - Being able to clean some code up is a plus
[u][b]Web Developer Requirements:[/u][/b]
- Knowledge in HTML, CSS, Java Script - Eye for design is a plus
[u][b]Coordinator Requirements:[/b][/u] - The ability to efficiently plan, organize and execute events needed - Contact me for the job duties
Thank you :)[/center]

item.title: Building A Strong Team
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“uncalled for, post:6, topic:554620”][quote author=Owner Fallen link=topic=673539.msg4507318#msg4507318 date=1461254456]
I can help with javascript programming on a 718 base i have made a couple of them in the past unfortunately i do not have the project files anymore based on pc swaps but message me on skype is kromaqee
[/quote]

What do you mean by you can help with “Javascript” programming on a “718” base? Javascript is a web language, it has nothing to do with what revision the RSPS is based on.[/quote]

Loll. This is over two months old. I have already built the team and it is strictly closed to other developers.

Read full topic

item.title: Building A Strong Team
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

Owner Fallen:

I can help with javascript programming on a 718 base i have made a couple of them in the past unfortunately i do not have the project files anymore based on pc swaps but message me on skype is kromaqee

What do you mean by you can help with “Javascript” programming on a “718” base? Javascript is a web language, it has nothing to do with what revision the RSPS is based on.

Read full topic

item.title: Building A Strong Team

item.description:
@rspsCold101 wrote:

I can help you with web developing.

Read full topic

item.title: Building A Strong Team
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:554620”][quote author=FoHammer link=topic=673539.msg4503615#msg4503615 date=1454383583]
[center] Hello, I’m going to give a basic overview, I’ll be keeping details minimal here.
I’m looking for dedicated, trustworthy, and respectful people who’re interested and seeking to grow with a long-term Developement Team & Orginization.
Serious canidiate only please. If you’re interested or have questions PM me, with the position you’re interested in, or with your questions + your skype name.

Available Positions:

  • GFX Artist
  • Java Programmer
  • Web Developer
  • Coordinator

GFX Artist Requirements:

  • You must provide, or either create something upon request to represent your skill level
  • Your work must be clean, and professional looking
  • Some images I need may have deadlines, they will be reasonable but you must be able to provide images upon deadlines

Java Programmer Requirements:

  • You must have a decent amount of knowledge in Java
  • You must be trustworthy
  • You must provide past projects, & Java experience (proof)
  • Being able to clean some code up is a plus

[b]Web Developer Requirements:[/b]

  • Knowledge in HTML, CSS, Java Script
  • Eye for design is a plus

Coordinator Requirements:

  • The ability to efficiently plan, organize and execute events needed
  • Contact me for the job duties

Thank you :)[/center]
[/quote]

You’re not giving a basic overview, you’ve literally put an image and told people you’re not telling anyone about it but they should get involved. Is this how you plan on leading a project? If you want people who are dedicated to you and what you do then you need to motivate them to get involved. Is it a paid job, is it for free? What level of dedication do you need? Is it an RSPS, is it for something else?[/quote]

Yes I am…
I don’t need people dedicating themselfs to me, but rather their work, and their job.
Yes of course, they are all paid-positions. It is an RSPS. It’s a 718.

Read full topic

item.title: Building A Strong Team
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“FoHammer, post:1, topic:554620”][center] Hello, I’m going to give a basic overview, I’ll be keeping details minimal here.
I’m looking for dedicated, trustworthy, and respectful people who’re interested and seeking to grow with a long-term Developement Team & Orginization.

  • Web Developer
  • Coordinator

GFX Artist Requirements:

  • You must provide, or either create something upon request to represent your skill level
  • Your work must be clean, and professional looking
  • Some images I need may have deadlines, they will be reasonable but you must be able to provide images upon deadlines

Java Programmer Requirements:

  • You must have a decent amount of knowledge in Java
  • You must be trustworthy
  • You must provide past projects, & Java experience (proof)
  • Being able to clean some code up is a plus

[b]Web Developer Requirements:[/b]

  • Knowledge in HTML, CSS, Java Script
  • Eye for design is a plus

Coordinator Requirements:

  • The ability to efficiently plan, organize and execute events needed
  • Contact me for the job duties

Thank you :)[/center][/quote]

You’re not giving a basic overview, you’ve literally put an image and told people you’re not telling anyone about it but they should get involved. Is this how you plan on leading a project? If you want people who are dedicated to you and what you do then you need to motivate them to get involved. Is it a paid job, is it for free? What level of dedication do you need? Is it an RSPS, is it for something else?

Read full topic
